title: why the hell
body: does ziggs have a 53% win rate botlane :|

replies.body: Late to the party there, huh?

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=nIPniuvw,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-01-11T02:13:32.896+0000)
>
> Late to the party there, huh?

yes im late
iv never seen him bot lane i was just checking op.gg an saw his win rate
It has to do with first turret gold snowballing. His passive + lichbane does insane damage to turrets, and his bomb executes turrets under 35% HP. Makes for really rude pushing and ganks, as well.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=nIPniuvw,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2017-01-11T04:03:32.844+0000)
>
> It has to do with first turret gold snowballing. His passive + lichbane does insane damage to turrets, and his bomb executes turrets under 35% HP. Makes for really rude pushing and ganks, as well.

its freakin BS 
dont know why they gave him a tower exicute like right now its better to just play ziggs
Cause the other 47% don't know what to do against him.
The team that takes the first tower has a 70% win rate.
